meanings.definition: To go along with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: My dog always accompanies me on my walks.
meanings.sent2: The music perfectly accompanies the dance routine.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accompanies the curious dog on their adventures.
meanings.sent4: Laughter often accompanies joy like a faithful friend.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze that accompanies the sunrise is truly magical.

meanings.definition: To be present or exist at the same time as something else.
meanings.sent2: A feeling of excitement usually accompanies the start of a new adventure.
meanings.sent3: The delicious aroma of freshly baked cookies accompanies the sound of laughter in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Hope accompanies every sunrise, promising a new beginning.
meanings.sent5: The scent of blooming flowers accompanies the arrival of spring.
